name: Oath of Conquest
description: Paladins who swear this oath seek glory in battle and the subjugation of their enemies.

3.name: Conquering Presence
3.description: Use Channel Divinity to force creatures of your choice within 30 feet to make a Wisdom save or be frightened of you for 1 minute.

3.name: Guided Strike
3.description: Use Channel Divinity to gain a +10 bonus to an attack roll after seeing the roll.

7.name: Aura of Conquest
7.description: Creatures frightened of you that start their turn in your 10-foot aura have their speed reduced to 0 and take psychic damage equal to half your paladin level.

15.name: Scornful Rebuke
15.description: When a creature hits you with an attack, it takes psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier if you're not incapacitated.

20.name: Invincible Conqueror
20.description: For 1 minute, you have resistance to all damage, make one additional attack when you take the Attack action, and your melee weapon attacks score a critical hit on a 19 or 20. Once per long rest.
